title: Call Of Duty Online
description:
"Call of Duty Online will showcase the traditional features and play-modes of
 Call of DutyÃ‚Â® with localized, unique content tailored to the needs and 
 interest of gamers in China."
Ã¢â‚¬â€ Activision
Call of Duty Online (also known as CODOL) is a Call of Duty game released 
exclusively in China as a "free-to-play micro transaction game" published, 
marketed, and distributed by Tencent Holdings and fully developed by Activison 
Shanghai and Raven Software. The game entered open beta on January 14th, 2013. 
The game features a new gaming model which gives the player the ability to 
personalize weapons, characters and equipment "with localized, unique content 
tailored to the needs and interest of gamers in China.". The game also reuses 
dozens of maps, character models and weapons from both the Modern Warfare 
and Black Ops series, which can be seen on its trailers.

The game features a campaign mode in which the player controls Rook and has 
returning characters such as Price, Soap and Ghost. There is also a robot Zombies 
mode in Call of Duty Online.

I take no responsibility of this game and in no way shape or form claim this to be
mine.

HOW TO INSTALL: (I recommend you use Chrome to translate the web pages)
1.  Download files.

2.  Seed just because.

3.  Register at http://zc.qq.com/en/index.html?from=pt (Don't change your location
    from China).

4.  Extract "Call Of Duty Online.rar".

5.  Open "Call Of Duty Online.exe" (There are three buttons in the bottom right.
    The big one is start, the top small one is pause, and the bottom small one is
    options).

6.  Enter your login information (Email in the top box and password at the bottom).

7.  Wait on the download. Watch some tv while you wait.

8.  When finished downloading, it will show a popup (It's in English, weird 
    I know..........), click yes or the left button and set your directory to
	whatever and keep clicking next, it will install, give it some time........a 
	very long time (When the install is finished uncheck the box before closing).

9.  When installed, open "Call Of Duty Online Update.exe".

10. Click the bottom right-most button with a yellow circle and arrow surrounding the
    circle.

11. It will require you to login (If numbers are in the top box leave it and type
    the password. If not, type your email at the top and password at the bottom.)

12. It will start downloading immediately, go get something to drink while waiting.

13. When finished a window should pop up, click the left button or yes.

14. Just click next for the installation (Change the install directory to the same 
    place you installed the game) (It's also in English............)

15. Game is on the desktop.

16. Now for the most important part.........Enjoy!!!

17. Updates at(Requires Login) (This update 
    is 1.1.1.11 January 26).

18. To update just do the same thing you installed the first update.

Thank you for choosing me for a flight to a one way trip to nostalgia.
